metadata.title: CVE-2014-4168 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: (1) iodined.c and (2) user.c in iodine before 0.7.0 allows remote attackersto bypass authentication by continuing execution after an error has beentriggering.

criterions.comment: iodine: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
